Text:
Hail, [*] Queen, mother of Mercy,
One of Life, gentleness, and hope.
Children of Eve, we cry in our exile.
Towards you, we sigh, mourn, and weep in this valley of tears.

O you, our advocate,
Turn your eyes of mercy towards us.
As we end our exile, show us Jesus, the blessed fruit of your flesh.
O merciful, good, and sweet Virgin Mary.
